mlflex
Class PredictiveValueWeightedVoteEnsemblePredictor

java.lang.Object
  mlflex.AbstractEnsemblePredictor
      mlflex.AbstractWeightedVoteCombiner
          mlflex.PredictiveValueWeightedVoteEnsemblePredictor

public class PredictiveValueWeightedVoteEnsemblePredictor
extends AbstractWeightedVoteCombiner

The ensemble/combiner approach represented in this class uses the "predictive value" for the specified dependent-variable value to determine weights. The predictive value is the proportion of instances that were predicted to be the specified class that were predicted correctly.

Author:
Stephen Piccolo
